summary: Milan Cathedral, officially named the Metropolitan Cathedral-Basilica of the Nativity of Saint Mary, is a massive church in Milan, Italy. Its construction started in 1386 and took about 579 years to finish! It's the biggest church in Italy and the third largest globally. The cathedral is dedicated to the birth of Saint Mary and is an important religious site, led by Archbishop Mario Delpini. Its impressive architecture and long history make it a famous landmark.
title: Milan Cathedral
